description: Application for a non-material amendment to planning permission Ref:P1984.22 dated 10/02/2023 to allow for external walls to be rendered white (First floor rear extension with the installation of a window in the side elevation at first floor level (obscurely glazed and fixed shut to 1.7m). Single storey side/rear extension and conversion of garage to habitable space)
decision_conditions: The proposal would conflict with condition 2 of application ref: P1984.22 which required materials to match the existing building. This reflects the details shown in the application form submitted for ref P1984.22 and the approved drawings which stated brickwork to match existing. As such the alterations shown cannot be considered as non-material amendment and require a fresh application for planning permission.
